Introduction¶

ermllitelib helps to process XML instance documents that obey the ermllite XML schema.

With ermllitelib (ermllitelib.py) you can write Python code to:

  • Parse an XML document that obeys the ermllite XML schema, creating instances of the Python classes that represent the types defined in the ermllite schema. These Python classes are defined in ermllitelib.py.

  • Create instances of classes that represent the types described in the ermllite XML schema.

  • Write Python application code that uses the classes that represent ermllite types.

  • Export the objects to an XML document.

Schemas¶

The ermllitelib.py module in this package was generated from the XML schemas in ./schemas.

generateDS.py¶

The ermllitelib.py module in this package was generated by generateDS.py. You can learn about generateDS.py here: http://www.rexx.com/~dkuhlman/generateDS.html
